DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate outcome follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) co-administration human chorionic gonadotrophin trigger woman unexplained infertility ( UEI ) assign letrozole ( LTZ ) stimulate intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Dual FSH/HCG Trigger Letrozole Stimulated Intrauterine Insemination Cycles Women With Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomized control study include 108 woman unexplained infertility recruit among attend Gynecology Outpatient Clinics , Benha University Hospital , private setting , Alkalubia , Egypt Jun 2013 Aug 2015 . The study protocol approve Local Ethics Committee write informed consent take partner start study . All woman receive regimen ovarian stimulation use Letrozole ( Femara ; Novartis pharma AG , Basle , Switzerland ) 2.5 mg tab twice daily 5 day start cycle day 3 . Transvaginal ultrasound scan ( TVS ) perform daily cycle day 9 total 10,000 IU hCG ( Epifasi , EPICO ) administer least one ovarian follicle ≥18 mm size . On day hCG administration woman randomly categorize two group accord computer generate random numerical table . Envelopes contain allocation information choose sequentially patient presence husband . Group A receive FSH ( urofollitropin ; Fostimon , IBSA , Bazel , Swiz ; 75 IU amp ) 150 IU inject day hCG injection group B receive FSH day hCG injection . Intrauterine insemination perform 36 hour HCG injection . Women group receive luteal phase support form vaginal progesterone , ( Prontogest 400 mg Vaginal Pessaries , IBSA ) twice day , start day IUI continue till eighth week , pregnancy test positive.Two week later , quantitative ßhCG estimate diagnose chemical pregnancy . However , TVS perform 4 week positive pregnancy test confirm clinical pregnancy presence gestational sac fetal echo pulsation exclude ectopic pregnancy . All woman enrol study underwent study protocol three consecutive cycle unless get pregnant .
DOC.criteria: Unexplained infertility 2 year Normal ovulation prove midluteal serum progesterone level > 5 ng/ml , Patent fallopian tube confirm hysterosalpingography laparoscopy Normal semen analysis accord modify World Health Organization ( WHO ) criteria Normal hormonal profile ( FSH , LH , prolactin TSH ) early follicular phase . Other cause infertility ( tubal factor , polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) , endometriosis ) Ovarian cyst , FSH > 10 mIU/ml . Previous intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) cycle , Liver kidney disease , Hypersensitivity use medication .
